name: Valid bug report with reproduction steps

input.title: TypeError when parsing empty PDF
input.body:
## Description
When parsing an empty PDF file, the application crashes with a TypeError.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Create an empty PDF file
2. Run `parse_pdf('empty.pdf')`
3. See error

## Expected Behavior
Should return an empty result or raise a descriptive error.

## Actual Behavior
```
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
```

## Environment
- Python 3.11
- OS: macOS 14.0
